response.overview: When a young man took a short cut through a darkened city park, there was one thing he forgot to check… the size of the moon!  After surviving a werewolf attack Michael must come to terms with the hand fate has dealt him, and evade 19th Century Scottish justice. To his rescue comes Caroline his estranged lover and the mysterious Dr Jenkins. With the law and church hot on their trails the trio take refuge in Dr Jenkins secret lab and attempt to find a cure for Michael’s condition before time runs out.  As the full moon draws closer Michael’s future will be decided by the winner of this battle between science and religion!
response.title: Black Moon
